'''21w05b''' is the eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.17]], released on February 4, 2021, which fixes three bugs and make changes to the copper and its other variants' name.<ref>{{snap|21w05b|February 4, 2021}}</ref>

== Changes ==
'''[[Block of copper]] and variants'''
* Renamed "Copper Block" to "Block of Copper".
* Removed the word "Block" from oxidized variants of blocks of copper, including waxed variants.
** The IDs have also been updated.
* Renamed "Waxed Copper" to "Waxed Block of Copper".
** The ID has been changed from <code>waxed_copper</code> to <code>waxed_copper_block</code>.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=21w05b
|;dev
|203813|Copper blocks are named inconsistently.
|205054|Copper blocks called "Copper Block", while blocks of quartz are called "Block of Quartz".
|;previous
|213788|The game can randomly freeze.
|213802|Copper is not upgraded correctly from pre-21w05a worlds.
}}</onlyinclude>
